meaningMnemonic: You want to <radical>slice</radical> what you <radical>say</radical> in half so that people focus on <kanji>the above</kanji> text first. The above is what you want them to see! So slice what you say!
readingMnemonic: As you focus on <kanji>the above</kanji> words you realize a <reading>guy</reading> (がい) is trying to push the rest of the things you're saying back up with the rest of them. No! The above text is all that matters! Go away guy!
